frozen_definition.name: Momentum
frozen_definition.signal_source: Creative platform analysis: 'Email threads are where creative momentum goes to die' and 'peaks and valleys signal scattered priorities or running on adrenaline'
frozen_definition.description: Simple creative project momentum tracker that identifies delivery patterns and warns against burnout cycles without complex project management
frozen_definition.target_user: Freelancers and small creative teams who struggle with inconsistent project delivery and momentum loss
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Analysis shows 'team that delivers quickly then slows to crawl' and 'requests stuck in approval for days lose momentum'
core_loop: Log project milestones with simple tap
Get gentle warnings before momentum drops
frozen_definition.differentiation: Focus purely on momentum vs. complex project management, emphasizes pattern recognition over feature richness
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes team sharing, detailed analytics, and integration with common creative tools

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for individual use, premium for team features and advanced analytics
